thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Asia Pacific Strategic Investments Updates on Proposed Acquisition Of Shares In IPC Corp

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Asia Pacific Strategic Investments Updates on Proposed Acquisition Of Shares In IPC Corp
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Asia Pacific Strategic Investments Ltd :
* ASIA PACIFIC STRATEGIC INVESTMENTS DECIDED IT WILL ACCEPT WITHDRAWAL & NOT PROCEED WITH CO’S ACQUISITION OF 28.1 MILLION TARGET SHARES FROM OEI HONG LEONG​
* CO INTENDS TO PROCEED WITH ACQUISITION OF 11.9 MILLION TARGET SHARES FROM INDIVIDUALS
* ‍ISSUE PRICE FOR EACH REMAINING CONSIDERATION SHARE SHALL BE S$0.00332 PER SHARE ​
* ‍CONSIDERATION FOR REMAINING ACQUISITION BE SATISFIED BY ALLOTMENT AND ISSUANCE OF 1.58 BILLION NEW ORDINARY SHARES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
